courses.title: Beginner Guitar
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano
courses.description: Master advanced piano techniques and repertoire.including chords, strumming

courses.title: Music Theory Basics
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory and including chords, strumming& how to read music.

courses.title: Vocal Training
courses.description: Improve your singing technique and  including chords,technique and  strumming vocal range.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn how to improvise and  including chords, strumming play jazz music.

courses.title: Drumming for Beginners
courses.description: Get started with drumming and learn basic rhythms and techniques.

courses.title: Music Production
courses.description: Learn how to produce and record your own music.

courses.title: Saxophone Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the saxophone, including tone production and fingerings.

courses.title: Violin for Beginners
courses.description: Learn how to play the violin, from basic techniques to simple songs.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn the art of electronic music production, including beat-making and sound design.
